title: ECE One Sem Culminat Des
description: A single-semester ECE culminating design experience forming ECE-only teams, proposing, prototyping, testing, demonstrating, formally presenting and documenting projects incorporating engineering standards and realistic constraints.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3011 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ((ECE 3025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) or (ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C))
